Back to Franz Liszt

Franz Liszt

Mosonyis Grabgeleit, S. 194

1870 · LW A249 · R. 110

[IMSLP]

Mosonyis Grabgeleit was originally written as a piece for solo piano (S. 194; LW A249; R. 110). It also exists in a version for piano duet that is possibly by Liszt (S. 756; LW W5). Liszt later revised the ending of the piece and included it in the Historische ungarische Bildnisse (S. 205; LW A335; R. 112).

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · Suppl. 8 · Z. A/B 14503 · ed. Adrienne Kaczmarczyk / Ágnes Sas

Duration: 6' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5
